Articles.Content:
Hi guys! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I was looking for some great iva's in a cockpit!

Please put a link for the mod with the cockpit and maybe a pic of the iva!

Thanks!

Yea i found that! It looks beautiful! But i came to post here because i was wondering is there is anything as good as that! If there is ,i'm not going to be surprised ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Any of alexustas mods that have a IVA ALCOR,"Advanced Landing Capsule has Red Iron Crown pointed out and his ERS rover mod [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947)

EDIT- His is pretty much top and don't mean that in a bad way to any other has there are some good looking ones with RPM's now if you want IVA that don't have RPM's then DennyTX's work is IMO top for that style.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T18:53:05Z" title="05/15/2015 06:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Is there any other awesome iva's which have RPM and are not made by alexustas? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thanks anyway!

You might look at AIPS [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99252-0-90-AIPS-Better-IVA-Prop-Placement-v4-BobCat-Ind-HOME-3-Update](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99252-0-90-AIPS-Better-IVA-Prop-Placement-v4-BobCat-Ind-HOME-3-Update) & AKI [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs) & for FASA [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66824-0-23-5-FASA-Gemini-IVA-Modernization-2-0-%28RasterPropMonitor%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66824-0-23-5-FASA-Gemini-IVA-Modernization-2-0-%28RasterPropMonitor%29) & [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100445-Dreamer-SNC-Dreamchaser-Mod-V1-0-released](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100445-Dreamer-SNC-Dreamchaser-Mod-V1-0-released)! and KSO [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68429-0-23-5-Kerbin-Shuttle-Orbiter-System-v2-08-aka-Kerbin-Mini-Shuttle](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68429-0-23-5-Kerbin-Shuttle-Orbiter-System-v2-08-aka-Kerbin-Mini-Shuttle)

EDIT- There was some more but right know my mind is blank.

> 
> Is there any other awesome iva's which have RPM and are not made by alexustas? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thanks anyway!

Nertea has the Mk3-9 pod (2 kerbal, but has full autonomy). [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-21)

Wholly custom RPM-powered IVA.
